topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Browsers :: Plugins and add-ons

name: MBlogi Cricket
short_description:
How does MBlogi Cricket work?
MBlogi Cricket allows you easily to display Live Scores and statistics of Cricket on your Wordpress Blog. The plugin can be installed and configured very easily.

Features include:

MBlogi Cricket keeps users with update cricket scores (ball by ball cricket score). It stems live data from cric.mblogi.com for the live, recent and fixture on the International and Non-international cricket, and displays it on your blog!

Full Score Board: View Match full score board of every match. If a match is live/ongoing then scoreboard will be refresh every 20secs providing you an up to date info.

Ongoing Series: It displays ongoing cricket series matches in detail.

Archive: This option provides you all the cricket records and the scoreboards from 1877 (first international match) till to date.

Widget: I. Current: It displays short details of ongoing matches with auto refresh for every 20 seconds. II. Recent: This displays 4 recent matches III: Fixtures :
summary: Display cricket live scores, full score board, archive, fixtures on WP
